thread.title: Linda Mccallie from Scotland
thread.title_full: allbeauty.com reviewed by Linda Mccallie from Scotland

author: Linda Mccallie from Scotland
title: Linda Mccallie from Scotland
text: I only received my purchase last week. I saw this face cream advertised on the Lorraine Kelly TV programme that it was on offer. So being a women went on the website purchased the cream plus the travel set. Only used for a few days but it is very good. I have to watch what I use but would recommend this.
